content.question: If <math alttext="x plus 3 times y to the one third power, equals y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></math>, what is <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 2 comma 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> ?

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
